staxel.village.character.dialogue.AlizaR: I'd love to change outta my work clothes at home, but it's jus' too much of a hassle.
Always gettin' called out to other task and I don' have the time to change!
Them new airships sure go pretty fast...
Ya had the chance to ride one?
We did some pretty impressive work right there...
Might change the whole worl' yet!
Been hearin' a lotta strange mutters over the communications...
Coulda sworn I heard somethin' about worl' domination or so...
Probably jus' a joke, of course!
I haven't lived with anyone since the ol' ex-husband.
Yer definitely a lot nicer to live with than 'im, that's fer sure!
